Recipe Recipe App Enter a recipe name Search Welcome to your Recipe View Saved Recipes Delete Save Recipe Image Title Source URL Sorry, This Recipe cannot be show Sorry, shi Recipe cannot be saved Search Permission Program created by Shanghao Li This App is a user-friendly mobile application that streamlines the process of finding recipes. Simply input the name of a recipe, and the app, powered by the Spoonacular API, retrieves a list of corresponding recipes. You can browse through the results, view detailed information, save your favorite recipes to a local database for easy access later. The app also remembers your search term for a seamless user experience. About OK help Delete Recipe Are you sure you want to delete this recipe? CST2335 031 W24 Final Project Search Saved terms Save About Help Version 0.1, created by Ping Liang This app is easy to use:
 1.Enter the word you want to search and click the "Search" button
 2.Add the searched term to your saved list by clicking the menu at the top
 3.Navigate your saved words by clicking the "Saved terms" button
 4.You can delete the saved words from your list by click the specific words and confirm deletion
 That's all you need to know, enjoy! About this APP: Delete Error formatting definitions. Sorry,found nothing Music saved successfully Music already in your list No music selected DeezerDiscover created by Jialin Wang Add your favorite song Do you want to delete the music of Yes No Undo> You deleted music #
Welcome to DeezerDiscover , here's a quick guide for you:

 1. Search Artist: Type in the name of the artist in the search bar and click on Search button.

 2. Dive into Details: Scroll down and click on the button for all details about the music of the artist that you search.

 3. Save for Later: Love this music? Save it for later by clicking on save icon.
 Your saved music will be easily accessible whenever you're ready to listen.
